roleset.name: move something on wheels
roleset.note: WHEEL-V NOTES: Note that the particle should be regarded as a directional, not partof phrasal verb, since you can have 'wheel up' 'wheel out' etc whichdon't really have different semantics except for the direction of movement. (from wheel.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Giant yellow cranes were wheeled up alongside the collapsed segment, preparing to lift off chunks of the debris.
example.arg: preparing to lift off chunks of the debris
